job_title: Front Desk Receptionist in High Point, NC
pros: Working with bethany you grow to realize that firing people is a last resort. If there is conflict between employees, they would rather work on relocating you than just getting rid of you. And they are always needing help since we have numerous locations.
cons: They don't pay you enough to put up with the drama you have to deal with. As a front desk person we are expected to answer every phone call that comes in through our phone, check patients in, check patients out, deal with patients billing issues and there is plenty of those. And we aren't allowed to consult the Medical Aides in the back when the phone call coming through is their area of expertise. Management claims when you get hired on that they prefer for people within Bethany to reach for advancement before they look elsewhere for someone to fill the position. When the advancement is actually available and there is the opportunity for advancement you can count on not getting it unless you are a managers pet.
